overview: The Kingâ€™s daughter Bodil lay dying in the arms of King Erik. Her lover Rune embarks on a quest to find the cure before Harald, who makes a tempting offer to the king. Should Harald find a cure for Bodil then he shall take her hand in exchange for the castle. Rune travels across lands, battling those who cross him to find the elements of the cure with surprising consequences.
tagline: A viking is ready to take revenge on those that betrayed him...
title: The Viking Revenge
